text: Gung Ho (released in Australia as Working Class Man) is a 1986 American comedy movie directed by Ron Howard and starring Michael Keaton, Gedde Watanabe, George Wendt, John Turturro, Mimi Rogers, Clint Howard, Rance Howard, So Yamamura, Rick Overton. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures and was spun off into a short lived TV series in 1987. ==Other websites== * * * * * Category:1986 comedy movies Category:American buddy comedy movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Ron Howard Category:Movies adapted into television series Category:Movies set in factories Category:Movies set in Pittsburgh Category:Movies set in Tokyo Category:Movies set in Argentina
title: Gung Ho (movie)
